thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: Marcella Howard

author: Marcella Howard
title: Marcella Howard
text: The service was excellent, I dealt with Carter Laffan and he was very helpful and listened to what I wanted and found a very affordable deal with flights and hotel. All information I required was sent to me promptly and my whole trip from start to finish went very smoothly. I would happily recommend Dial a Flight and Carter Laffan as an excellent representative.
